recommendations: Keri Ames
Scholar, Writer, Mentor, Ph.D.
September 3, 2016, Jesse was a client of Keri’s

A remarkably visionary interdisciplinary scholar! Mr. Bates' profound gift for interpersonal communication is matched by an incisive intellect always in search of clarity and deeper meaning. Always generous and kind, he leads discussions in complex, daunting ideas with grace and charm. His is a stellar excellence fostered by an impressive work ethic. I still remember how much his eloquent, fascinating essays inspired me to better learning! One of the most impressive students I had at St. John's College!
Keri Ames

Empowering organizations and their people to realize their potential

Ron was my first point of contact at Revolution Foods and he was very professional and kind. He made our implementation move quickly and smoothly on a short timeline leading up to a new school year. Thanks, Ron!

Keri Ames
Scholar, Writer, Mentor, Ph.D.
September 5, 2016, Jesse was a client of Keri’s

Keri was my seminar tutor at St. John's College in 2008-09. Of all my seminar classes at the College, hers was my favorite because of the dynamic enthusiasm and joy she brought to our discussions. She struck the perfect balance between listening and speaking, directing discussion and allowing us to wrestle freely with the fundamental questions of the texts. Her gentle, encouraging presence together with her acute intellectual insight brought the best out of the students. In particular, she helped me grow tremendously in confidence as a seminar participant.
